alfredsnippet.snippet:
The Mystery of Comets, Fred Whipple, p.133-134

"Alfvén’s theory has great bearing on all hot plasmas in astronomy - stars, black holes, and even interstellar gases -- but the theory is almost unmanageable in practice. It is a challenge to theorists; it must be mastered, however, if further progress is to be made in understanding the universe."
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Alfven's Relevance for Astronomical Plasmas
